posts.post_title: C46 Buffalo Bisons for sale-ALL SOLD.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ed Hans
Near subset missing only Mararkey for completion. Priced individually as follows:

$20.00 each-White, (Murray*SOLD*), Sharpe, Corridon, (McAllister*SOLD*).
$30.00 each-(Brockett*SOLD*), Mitchell, (Truesdale*SOLD*).
$40.00 each-Baxter, (Schirm*SOLD*).
$75.00 each-(Stroud, Beebe**BOTH SOLD**).

[IMG]http://www.thecybersource.com/~edhans/c46s.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.thecybersource.com/~edhans/c46rev.jpg[/IMG]

ALL CARDS ARE SOLD. THANKS TO ALL WHO LOOKED OR BOUGHT.

Ed Hans
